column1: On rainy days my thoughts always drift toward cinnamon and cookies.
column2: 雨天我總是想著肉桂和餅乾。

column1: I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...
column2: 不知道瑪魯和哈維醫生會不會在一起？我確定哈維喜歡她……

column1: I think Maru will have to make the first move, though.
column2: 但是我覺得瑪魯一定會先踏出第一步。

column1: Hi, honey! I did some shopping this morning and got this for you.[186 180 770 535]
column2: 嗨，寶貝！今天早上我出去買東西了，並為你帶了這個。[186 180 770 535]

column1: I thought you could really use one of the those.
column2: 我覺得你一定用得上這個。

column1: Hmm... maybe I should experiment with a new recipe. You liked the last recipe I made, didn't you, honey?
column2: 嗯……也許我應該試驗一下新配方。寶貝，你喜歡我上次的那個配方，對吧？

column1: What was it called... 'Chili de @'?
column2: 叫什麼來著……「紅辣椒@」？

column1: On days like this, I love to curl up with a good book.
column2: 在這樣的日子裡，我喜歡窩起來讀一本好書。

column1: How was your day, honey? I spent my afternoon reading a novel.
column2: 親愛的，今天過得怎麼樣？我整個下午都在讀一本小說。

column1: This is a lot more peaceful than my old spot in town. I'm very happy here.
column2: 這比我在鎮裡的老地方更平靜。我在這裡很高興。

column1: I'm sure Mom's at the saloon right now... But I don't feel so bad about it anymore. It's out of my hands.
column2: 我想我媽現在肯定在酒吧……但是我對這件事感覺沒那麼糟糕了。我無能無力了。

column1: I was just thinking about that night we met in the bathhouse.
column2: 我只是在想我們在澡堂相遇的那一晚。

column1: I'll never forget that night...
column2: 我永遠不會忘記那一晚……

column1: The sound of rain used to bother me, when I lived in that old metal trailer. But it's quite soothing here.
column2: 我住在那個老拖車裡的時候，雨聲曾困擾我。但在這裡雨聲卻讓人慰藉。

column1: I felt like making a nice dinner. I hope you like it. [212 214 225 209 200]
column2: 我做了美美的晚餐。希望你喜歡。[212 214 225 209 200]

column1: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.
column2: 這裡真寧靜。我過去經常做最恐怖的惡夢，但是現在我睡得很香。

column1: Good morning, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]
column2: 早安啊，@！我給你做了熱騰騰的早餐！[195 210 211]

column1: It's important to me that you leave here with a full belly.
column2: 你填滿肚子再離開對我來說很重要。

column1: You know, I think I'll read a book today. I picked up something new from the library last time I was there.
column2: 嗯，我想我今天會看書。上次在圖書館的時候，我學到了一些新東西。

column1: Gunther asked me to say hi.
column2: 岡瑟讓我代他向你問好。

column1: I love to hear about all the artifacts you've found. Archaeology is fascinating!
column2: 我喜歡聽你講找到的那些古物。考古讓人著迷！

column1: To think... there may have been farmers at this very spot 10,000 years ago.
column2: 想想看……10,000 年前這個地方可能就有農夫了。

column1: Was I shy when we first met? It's funny to think about, now that we've come so far.
column2: 我們第一次見面的時候我很害羞嗎？現在想想我們已經走過漫漫長路，還真有趣。

column1: Good evening, honey. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today?
column2: 寶貝，晚安。你做完今天想要做的事了嗎？

column1: If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!
column2: 如果沒有，也沒關係。我們有的是時間！

column1: Hmm... skirt or pants tomorrow? Oh, who am I kidding... I always go with the skirt.
column2: 嗯……明天是穿短裙還是褲子？噢，我騙誰呢……我一直都是穿短裙。

column1: We have it good here. We should always try and remember those less fortunate than us.
column2: 我們在這裡過得很好。我們應該一直努力並記住那些沒我們幸運的人。

column1: I'm just very grateful for what we have.
column2: 我只是很感激我們所擁有的東西。

column1: Mom's probably pretty lonely now that I'm gone. I just hope she doesn't visit the saloon more to make up for it.
column2: 因為我離開了她身邊，媽媽現在可能很孤獨。我只是希望她不要太頻繁的去酒吧來打發寂寞。

column1: You shouldn't feel bad! Mom has to solve her own problems.
column2: 你不用感到難過！媽媽必須解決她自己的問題。

column1: Ready to tuck in? I made the bed and everything...
column2: 準備好鑽進被窩了嗎？我把床和其他的都準備好了……

column1: I only ever dreamed of living in such a beautiful place, and now it's come true.
column2: 我以前只是夢想能住在這樣美麗的地方，現在美夢成真了。

column1: I was so miserable back home.
column2: 我曾經在家的時候過得很悲慘。

column1: Isn't this a perfect place to raise children?
column2: 這難道不是撫育孩子的完美地方嗎。

column1: I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.
column2: 能在農場長大我簡直再開心不過了。

column1: Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!
column2: 嗨，寶貝！要是我多懂些耕種的知識，我一定會多幫幫你的。對不起！

column1: I'll be thinking of you.
column2: 我會一直想著你的。

column1: I just saw a songbird flying due west. In Stardew Valley that's a very good omen.
column2: 我看到正西方有一隻燕子在飛。在星露谷，這是很好的預兆。

column1: Ahh... It feels great to be outside. I could spend all day right here, observing every little thing.
column2: 啊……在外面感覺可真不錯！我可以在這裡待一整天，觀察每種小事物。

column1: Have you had any time to play with %kid1 today? Maybe a second child will make things better.
column2: 你今天有花一點兒時間和小%kid1玩耍嗎？也許再生一個小孩會更好些。

column1: Little %kid1 is going to have such a great childhood here.
column2: 小%kid1將在這裡度過快樂的童年。

column1: I feel a lot older now that we have a child. Maybe it's just this new responsibility weighing on me.
column2: 自從我們有了孩子後，我感覺自己老了很多。也許只是因為我承擔了新的責任。

column1: It's not bad! I've wanted this for a long time.
column2: 這感覺還不錯！我早就期待著養育孩子了。

column1: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They're such hungry children!
column2: 我已經給%kid1和%kid2餵過飯了。他們真是餓了！

column1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
column2: 有了%kid2後，我們要記得多關注些%kid1。我不想讓他們嫉妒對方。

column1: I've had this dream that %kid2 grew wings and flew into the night sky. What does it mean?
column2: 我夢到%kid2長了翅膀，飛向夜空。這意味著什麼？

column1: A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. We're so very fortunate.
column2: 一棟漂亮的房子，兩個可愛的孩子還有一方美麗的土地。我們真幸運。

column1: @...I still can't believe we're married...
column2: @……我還是不敢相信我們結婚了……

column1: I had dreams of marrying you for such a long time.
column2: 我一直都夢想和你結婚。

column1: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...
column2: 自從你搬到這裡，我就知道你是我的命中注定……

column1: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?
column2: 哇哦，你今天看起來帥呆了！你刮鬍子了嗎？

column1: Wow, you look beautiful today. Did you do something different with your hair?
column2: 哇哦，你今天看起來美極了。你換了髮型嗎？

column1: This place is really starting to feel like home.
column2: 這地方真的開始有家的感覺了。

column1: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry that you aren't eating enough wholesome food.
column2: 出去要小心啊！有時候我擔心你沒有吃足夠的健康食物。

column1: I'm going to head into town today, just for fun. I'll be back in a while!
column2: 我今天要去城鎮裡放鬆一下。我一會就回來！

column1: I had a nice time... It's good to stay in contact with everyone. Tell me about your day.
column2: 我玩得很愉快……與大家保持聯繫感覺很好。說說今天過得怎麼樣啊。

column1: Spring is probably my favorite season. There's a certain freshness in the air that fills me with hope.
column2: 春天大概是我最喜歡的季節。空氣裡面滿是生氣，讓我充滿了希望。

column1: We've got a long, warm year to look forward to. Let's make it a productive one.
column2: 期望今年天氣暖和。我們要在今年豐收。

column1: Ah, the 'spring cleaning'... I'm actually going to enjoy this.
column2: 啊，「春季大掃除」……其實我很享受這個。

column1: *phew*... I need to eat more melon to combat this heat!
column2: *呼*……我需要吃更多甜瓜消暑！

column1: Summer may be searing hot, but the humidity feels great on the skin.
column2: 夏天真熱，但是這濕度讓皮膚很舒服。

column1: In summer, the ants become very active. I could watch them for hours... they have a pretty complex civilization from the looks of it!
column2: 夏天，螞蟻會變得活躍起來。我可以看   牠們好幾個小時……從它們的外觀來看，螞蟻一定有複雜的文化。

column1: The smell of fall reminds me of the smell of books... weird, isn't it?
column2: 秋天的味道讓我想起書的味道……很奇怪，不是嗎？

column1: Fall... It makes me think of colored paper and glue. Maybe I'm spending too much time with the children.
column2: 秋天……讓我想到彩色的紙和膠水。可能是我和孩子們一起太久了。

column1: Will you grow any giant pumpkins this year?
column2: 你今年會種巨型南瓜嗎？

column1: Winter's a good time to unwind a bit. You deserve it after the long year!
column2: 冬天是放鬆的好時候。在漫長的一年後值得好好放鬆一下！

column1: The falling snow reminds me of grandma, rocking by the fire. I have this vivid memory of her shadow, flickering against the orange wood... That was long ago.
column2: 飄落的雪讓我想起我奶奶，坐在爐火旁的搖椅上。我印象最深的是她的影子在橙色的木材上忽隱忽現。那是很久以前的事了。

column1: How will we stay afloat this winter? Oh, you don't have to tell me... I trust you to make the right decisions.
column2: 這個冬天我們要怎麼維持生計？噢，你不必告訴我……我相信你會做出正確的決定。
